The untitled Queen Latifah biopic is an upcoming American biographical drama film depicting the life and career of the rapper Queen Latifah.
Production
In September 2024, it was announced that a film about the life and career of Queen Latifah had entered development, with Latifah, Shakim Compere, Will Smith, Miguel Melendez, Jesse Collins, Dionne Harmon, and Charlie Mack serving as producers.
